label: CG Core
description: This template is based on the CG Core 2.0 schema, and can support the description of objects to be submitted to instances of Dataverse, CKAN, dSPACE

label: ENA - Sequence Reads
description: This template supports the submission of raw sequence reads to the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA)

label: ENA - Sequence Assemblies
description: This template supports submission of sequence assemblies to the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA)

label: Figshare
description: This template supports the submission of object to Figshare, which accepts many file formats including PDFs, image, audio, and video files

label: MIAPPE Compliant
description: MIAPPE is a Minimum Information (MI) standard for plant phenotyping. This template option defines a list of attributes for describing a phenotyping experiment

label: Dublin Core
description: Dublin Core is a generic community stardard metadata set for describing digital objects (such as images, video, pdfs, webpages) and physical objects (such as books or CDs). Items described with this schema can be submitted to repositories such as Dataverse or dSPACE instances
